website_summaries.verdict: A fun, easy-to-grab rattle that's available at a great price point.
pros: Consumers appreciate the low cost and good value of this rattle, as well as how easy it is to play with
The rattle's strong points include bright colors and light weight
We love that it catches baby's attention and is easy to clean
cons: Tends to be difficult to chew on
some felt the design was awkward

customer_reviews.title: Best baby Rattle
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had this rattle and when she outgrew it we handed it down. when I had my son I regretted not holding on to it. the rattle is light and perfect for little hands. Perfect and simple toy for any baby.
customer_reviews.author: NiNi

customer_reviews.title: Simple but love it
customer_reviews.text: My three month old son is grasping the rattle easily and it is light enough that he can shake it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Love this rattle!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my newborn daughter. It seems like it’s made of high quality material. The twirl design makes it easy to hold by my daughter’s tiny fingers. She enjoys shaking it to make a sounds from the beads. It’s not too loud. Just enough to keep her motivated to shake it more
customer_reviews.author: Eddie D

customer_reviews.title: Super rattle
customer_reviews.text: My baby started off playing with this rattle toy. This one is really good first rattle for babies i would say. It grabs baby attention and perfectly designed for first holdings for babies.
customer_reviews.author: Aby

customer_reviews.title: Fun to rattle, makes you smile
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this for my friends, grandbabies and nieces babies. They all love it. Easy for the little ones to hold. When they are about 3-4 months they love to shake it and hear the noise. Sometimes it can scare them cause they shake it so fast. It's too cute. You have to watch them at that age because they can bop themselves in the head. Oops...At 5+ months they love to put it in there mouth and try to shake it. They really have fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this rattle!
customer_reviews.text: It might be a simple toy but it’s a good one! The middle makes it easy for a little baby hand to hold it. The heads inside are nice for baby to watch and the reflective inside on one side is a nice touch. It is super cheap too so you can’t lose! Recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Pro and cons.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: •When I shake it, it is not too loud so it’s not overwhelming my baby. Cons: •it’s hard to clean. You cannot wash with water because it gets in the shaker parts and doesn’t dry well. •it is hard plastic. When child drops it on the face when he/she was laying down, it hurts. Overall, this toy is okay for my baby and me. We would be okay without it.
customer_reviews.author: E & K

customer_reviews.title: Easy to grip on and hasn’t chipped
customer_reviews.text: I been having this product since May 2020 it is now August 2020 and it has not broke or had any missing pieces. It is easy to clean all I do is wash with soap and water and let it air dry. The cross cross handles actually make it easier for my baby to grip on and he has some chunky hands. I was a bit worried because of the reviews of the rattle chipping but so far so good. My baby is now 9 months and he still enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son before he was born and he started using it at like a month old. He is now 10 months and still obsessed with it. One of his favorite little toys! We have to take it everywhere now. Not too loud either !!
customer_reviews.author: Carley

customer_reviews.title: Keeps baby entertained!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to help with the development of my 32 weeker preemie. The physical therapist recommended we buy a colorful rattle that can help with his sensory development. This was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Such a perfect first toy
customer_reviews.text: I love this little toy so much! It was gifted to my daughter years ago and has been passed down through many kids. I like the toy so much that I just bought it as a gift to give to another family. My favorite thing about it is that it is one of the first toys that very tiny babies are able to hold and shake. So fun!
customer_reviews.author: coolfizzin

customer_reviews.title: Best rattle
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES these! My dad had one at his house when we visited when she was 7 months and she didn’t put it down. So I found two colors online. She plays with them all the time still at 11 months. She loves to shake them and hear the noise. They’re so easy for her to hold unlike a lot of rattle type toys.
customer_reviews.author: M_C

customer_reviews.title: Good toy for babies
customer_reviews.text: My little boy is just starting to learn to grab things. He seems to like the toy. Overall, it’s a good and affordable purchase if you’re looking for small/safe toys for your babies.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this rattle! He’s now 5 months, but since he was about 3 months old, he’s been able to easily grasp on to it. He’s very amazed by the little balls inside too. I would definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Rattle
customer_reviews.text: Rattle cane as described. My baby didn’t seem to care for it as much tho (of course he’s more interested in things that’s not actually a toy lol). I still try to give it to him here and there tho
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, Inexpensive Toy
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this toy! She can easily grab it and has learned to shake it. It’s also easy to clean- I just wash with soapy water, rinse and allow it to air dry. It’s small enough to throw in the diaper bag or play with in the car.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Rattle
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a gift for my grandson and his Easter basket. He loves how it makes lots of sound and it is very easy for him to hold onto
customer_reviews.author: Keri A Evans

customer_reviews.title: Loves but cannot sterilize
customer_reviews.text: He loves these rattles! The only thing is you cannot submerge them in water. So I had to wipe down with antibacterial wipes then wipe them really well with wet towels before I could give to him. No sterilizing, which is kind of a PITA, but he doesn't seem to mind lol
customer_reviews.author: Anony

customer_reviews.title: Favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my little baby, he likes it, easy to carry, small and light for his little hands, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Soliman

customer_reviews.title: Better toys out there.
customer_reviews.text: I hate that my 5.5 month old can't hold it on his own. It's very awkward for him to hold it and be able to play with it. It's just ok because of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of six

customer_reviews.title: Just meh, looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: Was going to return but not worth the hassle. At least I got it on sale. Looks cheap, also realised after it was made in China. dont really like giving tiny babies who out everything in their mouths something manufactured in China. For $2, not worth the effort of returning. I wouldn't pay more for this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshopper61

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my little one since he loves the toys that make noise. So far he loves it!! I soaked it in bleach water when I got it and some of the solution seeped into the rattle part and was worried I ruined it. Fortunately it all dried up over night! Cute toy and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Alecia Renee

customer_reviews.title: My 6 month old likes it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my baby when he was 5 months old and now he’s 6 months and still likes it! He can shake it and also chewy on it because he chews on everything because he’s teething ! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Ashley E

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this rattle. It is super easy for her to hold. She learned how to shake it around 3-4 months. I’m shocked at how great the price is
customer_reviews.author: Deedee

customer_reviews.title: Cute baby rattle
customer_reviews.text: It's just a cute and simple baby rattle. Seems like a good quality and durable for babies.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha L.

customer_reviews.title: Love this toy!
customer_reviews.text: Great little rattle toy! The rattle is not loud and it's perfect size for my 2month old baby to grab and hold. Great toy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: MellyMay

customer_reviews.title: Solid basic toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when my little guy was first learning to hold items, after seeing it was rated highly. I was skeptical about the twist design, but it's a hit! My kiddo chose this rattle over all others we have. It seemed easier for him to hold and he likes the shiny background in the rattle portion.
customer_reviews.author: Memsy

customer_reviews.title: Baby tested
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use in daycare. Babies seem to enjoy playing with this rattle.... I use it during “ tummy time” Works best with older babies as it is difficult for little hands to hold. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Biggane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Baby Toy
customer_reviews.text: My nephew is just starting to grab and reach for things, and this is one of the easiest toys for him to hold onto. It also rattles just enough provide some entertainment without being overly noisy.
customer_reviews.author: KCS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: This rattle is perfect for little ones. It was delivered on-time, packaged good, and exactly as pictured! I highly recommend both the item and seller!
customer_reviews.author: tms9213

customer_reviews.title: It's a perfect toy for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 month old son. (He was 3 months at the time.) It was very easy for him to hold. It's been teaching him how to hold things. It's a great price and the item was sent to me in just one day of ordering!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Cute colorful rattle
customer_reviews.text: I like this rattle a lot, but my 5 month old keeps banging himself in the face with it, which makes him no longer interested. It is cute & grippable for little hands. I recommend for older infants.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncusty

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for a new born
customer_reviews.text: Babies can hold this toy easily. Since it makes noise, it encourages the baby to move her/his hand. Good for the baby’s excersice. It’s not heavy, easy to hold. Great price! I would buy it again :)
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Higgs

customer_reviews.title: A+++
customer_reviews.text: Great product, light weight, easy to clean, perfect spacing for young children to hold, my son loves it, loved the noise and the shiny coloring. Perfect stocking stuffer.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Cortese

customer_reviews.title: Little One Loves these rattles.
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that when I picked up or dropped my LO off at daycare, she almost always had one or two of these rattles in her hand. I decided we had to get some for home and was not disappointed. Nice quality and keeps my 9 month old happily entertained.
customer_reviews.author: FLDR

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with the price & quality
customer_reviews.text: Product shipped over night Quality is on point Totally worth it
customer_reviews.author: rag

customer_reviews.title: best baby rattle
customer_reviews.text: I have bought little rattles just like this for so many babies. They love the rattle because they can grip it for chewing on easily. I used to work NICU and I bought these because they were cheap, durable and easy to clean. I boght this for my grand daughter and she loves this rattle.
customer_reviews.author: Katie1554

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than the picture made me believe. 6 month baby not interested.
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the description better but the toy is much smaller that the pictures makes you believe. My 6 month grandson was not interested at all and he does play with other toys a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie B

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves this rattle
customer_reviews.text: Our baby loved this rattle since she was first able to grab onto things. At almost 10 months old it is still one of her favorites. It's got enough beads to make a great sound when shaken, nice bright colors, and is easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Duffman

customer_reviews.title: Buy this for your baby!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loved this rattle, still does actually. We gifted once he was able to start grabbing and shake on his own, and he still likes playing with it, he’s 10 months old now.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little hands to grip...
customer_reviews.text: Great toy, my 7 month old loves it... especially for the price. Perfect for little hands to grip. Seems to be well made.. so far so good. Definitely doesn't appear to be cheap... I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: N8Gr33n

customer_reviews.title: Easy to play
customer_reviews.text: Easy toy for our 4 month old to hold and play
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this such great bright colors and easy to hold!
customer_reviews.author: Honest reviews

customer_reviews.title: Must have for baby
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to hold It seems to be his favorite toy He was able to grab it as early as 4 months old
customer_reviews.author: don't get this app

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: My great niece just started teething so she loves chewing on this as well as playing with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this rattle for my almost 4 months old grandson and it is one of his favorites. The curve of the handle with the space between makes it easy for little hands to grab and hold. The bumps on the rattle ends make a nice texture for teething babies as well. I would definitely purchase this to add to a baby shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it based on reviews - happy I did! Go to toy as it is very easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: joyce

customer_reviews.title: Best $3 ever spent
customer_reviews.text: My baby LOVES this toy. He’s 3.5 months old. He loves to hold this and shake it. He can play with it independently. It’s his favorite. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: My Newborn Grandson loves his rattle
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my New Grandson and he loves it !! Its very durable and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Camera Kid

customer_reviews.title: Easy for 3 month old to hold
customer_reviews.text: My son is 3 months old and can hold this toy easily. Cute little rattle.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Fun colorful toy for the baby
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my grand baby. It easy for her to hold. The colors are bright. It securely holds the little beads so, its safe for her to play with and shake it. There isn't any sharp edges.
customer_reviews.author: dcollinstx

customer_reviews.title: Baby will love this rattle.
customer_reviews.text: Great rattle sound. Baby will be able to hold the rattle. Great sound and quality. Perfect price.
customer_reviews.author: Delina Wall

customer_reviews.title: 4 month olds favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: Colors, beads, shiny mirror in one of them. He loves to chew on it and this was the first toy he held
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Just order it!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand why all babies seem to unanimously love this rattle but they do. Super great price for something that entertains them for so long!
customer_reviews.author: JCopr

customer_reviews.title: Good, lightweight rattle
customer_reviews.text: The size of this rattle is good for a Baby. Our six-month old loves it, and doesn’t hurt himself when he hits himself in the face with it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Rattle for the Price
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this rattle... for now at least. I noticed the old school rattles he was playing with at grandmas were much harder for him to hold. You don’t want to submerge this in any water. I just used some organic sanitizer and a towel to wipe all over it. Overall great rattle for the price. The mirror, beads, noise, and design of it will keep him entertained for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little hands.
customer_reviews.text: The quality seems nice and I like the colors. My son is just learning how to grasp objects and he has no problem grabbing on to this rattle. I can't speak to the durability yet.
customer_reviews.author: Riley A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby shower
customer_reviews.text: For this for a baby shower gift and mama to be loved it! Not a lot of people think to gift teethers and toys
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Best spent $3
customer_reviews.text: This is my baby’s favorite toy. I bought this for her when she was just 3 months. She’s now almost 9 months and still plays with it everyday. Best $3 spent.
customer_reviews.author: B. Duong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tiny hands
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size fod tiny hand 3 mo can easily hold its small enough and not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: thumpa2001

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great, simple toy, especially for the price! I work in the pediatric rehab therapy world and love to use this toy!
customer_reviews.author: Doug B

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves
customer_reviews.text: Favorite toy of last week for my little guy. Likes to shake the rattle. Starting to get a little annoyed with it because it not chewable. Seems to prefer his fingers.
customer_reviews.author: JIT

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: This is a classic rattle and a perfect addition for any diaper bag! It's easy for my baby to grasp and shake, eye catching, and fun. Definitely recommend. Especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Packaged well
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, unsure if baby will like it, but the packaging came fully intact. Happy with how it looked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for long term
customer_reviews.text: Even though he isn't playing with it yet since he's only 4 months, he loves to look at it and likes the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: Nice little rattle! These colors are pretty neutral for either gender. The twisty handles make it fairly easy for little ones to grasp and keep hold of this and have texture to it. One side is clear with little beads and the other has a mirrored backing. Good size, packs well, I wash it with warm soapy water to keep clean after all the drooling on it. My baby really enjoys this and seems satisfied with herself when she can maneuver it, the little beads are mesmerizing to her. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: sweete13

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My babies loves these and now my twin nieces do too! Very colorful and pleasant noise.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Bright and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my parrot. Its bright and colorful. He seems a bit scared of it for now but I am sure Ollie will enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: sharon cinnamon

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Not quite what I was expecting. It’s a lot smaller then I was expecting and the rattle sound is very faint. I’d recommend a better shaker then this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby raccoons
customer_reviews.text: I can't say how this would work for toddlers, I bought it for a wildlife rehabilitator that has a bunch of baby raccoons. They love it!
customer_reviews.author: SarahQ

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Every baby should have this rattle. Easy to hold, fun to shake. My baby boy loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Minnamae

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight rattle for newborns
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I love how lightweight this rattle is. It is very easy for my newborn to grasp, even with his little hands. All the other rattles I saw in the store were either too big or too heavy. With this one, he can practice his motor skills, like holding the rattle in one hand and then passing it to the other hand. The rattle sound isn't too loud either and it's a nice, bright neutral color. The only thing I don't like about it is that when I wash it, water gets inside the rattle and then takes a while to dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good Enough for My Parrot😁
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my conure parrot! She lifts it with both her beak and talons. No sharp edges, colorful and not annoyingly noisy 😁🦜
customer_reviews.author: Louise P.

customer_reviews.title: cute rattles
customer_reviews.text: I love that they were all individually wrapped, keeping them clean! they came in a box as well so they can all stay separate from other toys! each toy has a rattle, its own version of movement and a soft spot for teething. my 3 month old son is enthralled by the rattles of each toy. they all seem solid and not cheap
customer_reviews.author: Tia Burns

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 1/ 2 months nephew loves it. It is easy to hold and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Cuco

customer_reviews.title: This rattle goes everywhere with us!
customer_reviews.text: Easy for little hands to grab on to and our little one loves the noise

customer_reviews.text: Baby loved shaking it, holding it and, of course, putting it in his mouth.

customer_reviews.title: Rattle my LO loves the most

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 month old loves this toy!! Gets super excited when I hand it to him:)

customer_reviews.title: Good for 6 month old
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 month old loves it! Very easy to hold, clean and the nose it makes when shaken is great! He really loves it and likes to suck on the end.
customer_reviews.author: Lmm61819

customer_reviews.title: Great rattle - robust so far
customer_reviews.text: Our little boy loves this rattle - it is colorful, is easy for him to grab hold of, the little plastic balls make noises he likes, and he can munch on it as he's teething. We've wiped it with soapy water, never immersed it, and we've not had any problems with water retention or condensation. It is robust, seems totally safe, and survives being thrown from his high chair. What else do you need from a rattle?!
customer_reviews.author: ROB BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Such a nice toy
customer_reviews.text: A very use small toy. My 5m old loves it

customer_reviews.text: Very cute rattle, easy to grip. Keeps my granddaughter busy and happy 😊

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My some just turned 4 months and he loves it! Light weight and noisy lol. His old rattle was too bulky and didn't make enough sound for him to be interested but this one is perfect 👌👍

customer_reviews.title: Love that the rattle has a lot of little noise maker!
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot of rattles come with those small beads but this one does. It makes a lot of noise and my baby loves it!

customer_reviews.title: A big hit with my grandchild
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this rattle. Its thin bars gave her something easy to grip early on. She was fond of playing with it for a long time.

customer_reviews.text: It’s little hard to hold because it is twisted in middle. It hard so if your baby hits to face while playing it will be painful Easy to clean.

customer_reviews.title: A good infant toy
customer_reviews.text: Recommended to me by my daughters development instructor. It is light weight and easy for my infant to hold. She loves it.

product_meta.title: Bright Starts Rattle & Shake Barbell Toy, Ages 3 months Plus
product_meta.description:
Your baby’s on the way to becoming a weightlifting champ with this barbell baby toy from Bright Starts! With cheerful yellow and blue details and a fun twisty handle, this rattle is as cute as can be and as strong as your growing baby. Easy to grasp handles, rattle beads and mirrored surfaces make this toy a perfect addition to the toy box. Toss in the diaper bag for smiles on the go.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Colorful rattling fun makes this one of baby's favorites.
feature_bullets: Textured handle is easy for baby to grasp
Mirror and beads inside reflect light

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars3,008 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
